input.sentences: while the house was n't quite what we expected ...
we were worried more about the lovely beach in front of us ...
and | the scenery that only cabo provides .
we spent the week kayaking and swimming ...
output.sentences: We arrived at the rental house but it was not as we expected.
I was worried it would ruin our vacation, but the beachfront was lovely so we took a stroll.
The scenery in Cabo is truly lovely.
We spent the whole week on the water, swimming and canoeing.
It was very relaxing enjoying the beautiful surroundings.
